body: This black scabbard is engraved with intricate silver runes that depict all manner of bladed weapons. A scabbard of keen edges can shrink or enlarge to accommodate any knife, dagger, sword, or similar weapon up to and including a greatsword. Up to three times per day on command, the scabbard casts keen edge on any blade placed within it. Runes similar to those on the outside of the scabbard appear on a blade while it is under this keen edge effect.
name: Scabbard of Keen Edges
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Slotless/Slotless Wondrous Items/Scabbard of Keen Edges
